Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.7 Pañhāvāra » 21.7.1 Paccayānuloma » 21.7.1.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Āhāra
Ajjhattattika
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānuloma
Vibhaṅgavāra
Āhāra
43.
2841Ajjhatto dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—  ajjhattā āhārā sampayuttakānaṃ khandhānaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānānañca rūpānaṃ āhārapaccayena paccayo. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe…  ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2842Ajjhatto dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—  ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (2)
2843Bahiddhā dhammo bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo (pavattipaṭisandhi) bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2844Bahiddhā dhammo ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—  bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (2)
44.
2845Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca ajjhattassa dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—  ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca ajjhattassa kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (1)
2846Ajjhatto dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammo ca bahiddhā dhammassa āhārapaccayena paccayo—  ajjhatto kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kabaḷīkāro āhāro ca bahiddhā kāyassa āhārapaccayena paccayo. (2)
